languages.text: {n}Женщина желчно усмехается.{/n} "Ты мне угрожать вздумал, техножрец? Что же, я тоже сохраню это воспоминание. Кто знает, кому из нас двоих скорее доведется предстать перед строгим судом? Я ли буду стоять в цепях перед твоими братьями... Или ты в шлюзе — перед моими ребятками".

{n}She chuckles darkly.{/n} "Do you mean to threaten me, Tech-Priest? Well, then, I'll keep a record of this conversation, too. I wonder which of us will feel the harsh hand of justice first? Will it be me, standing in chains before your brethren, or you, standing in an airlock before my boys?"
languages.original_text: {n}Женщина желчно усмехается.{/n} "Ты мне угрожать вздумал, техножрец? Что же, я тоже сохраню это воспоминание. Кто знает, кому из нас двоих скорее доведется предстать перед строгим судом? Я ли буду стоять в цепях перед твоими братьями... Или ты в шлюзе — перед моими ребятками".

traits.locale_text: {n}She chuckles darkly.{/n} "Do you mean to threaten me, Tech-Priest? Well, then, I'll keep a record of this conversation, too. I wonder which of us will feel the harsh hand of justice first? Will it be me, standing in chains before your brethren, or you, standing in an airlock before my boys?"

{n}She chuckles darkly.{/n} "Do you mean to threaten me, Tech-Priest? Well, then, I'll keep a record of this conversation, too. I wonder which of us will feel the harsh hand of justice first? Will it be me, standing in chains before your brethren, or you, standing in an airlock before my boys?"

{n}She chuckles darkly.{/n} "Do you mean to threaten me, Tech-Priest? Well, then, I'll keep a record of this conversation, too. I wonder which of us will feel the harsh hand of justice first? Will it be me, standing in chains before your brethren, or you, standing in an airlock before my boys?"

{n}She chuckles darkly.{/n} "Do you mean to threaten me, Tech-Priest? Well, then, I'll keep a record of this conversation, too. I wonder which of us will feel the harsh hand of justice first? Will it be me, standing in chains before your brethren, or you, standing in an airlock before my boys?"

languages.text: {n}她阴狠地笑了起来。{/n}“你是在威胁我吗，技术神甫？很好，既然如此，我也会把这次谈话记录下来。我想知道，我们之中是谁会先感受到正义之手的责罚？是我先戴着镣铐站在你的兄弟们面前，还是你先被我的手下丢出气闸？”
languages.original_text: {n}She chuckles darkly.{/n} "Do you mean to threaten me, Tech-Priest? Well, then, I'll keep a record of this conversation, too. I wonder which of us will feel the harsh hand of justice first? Will it be me, standing in chains before your brethren, or you, standing in an airlock before my boys?"

traits.locale_text: {n}她阴狠地笑了起来。{/n}“你是在威胁我吗，技术祭司？很好，既然如此，我也会把这次谈话记录下来。我想知道，我们之中是谁会先感受到正义之手的责罚？是我先戴着镣铐站在你的兄弟们面前，还是你先被我的手下丢出气闸？”

languages.text: {n}Se ríe siniestramente.{/n} «¿Quiere amenazarme, tecnosacerdote? Bueno, pues yo también anotaré esta conversación. Me pregunto quién de los dos sentirá antes el peso de la justicia. ¿Seré yo, encadenada ante sus hermanos, o será usted, delante de una esclusa y rodeado por mis muchachos?».
languages.original_text: {n}She chuckles darkly.{/n} "Do you mean to threaten me, Tech-Priest? Well, then, I'll keep a record of this conversation, too. I wonder which of us will feel the harsh hand of justice first? Will it be me, standing in chains before your brethren, or you, standing in an airlock before my boys?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Se ríe siniestramente.{/n} «¿Quiere amenazarme, tecnosacerdote? Bueno, pues yo también anotaré esta conversación. Me pregunto quién de los dos sentirá antes el peso de la justicia. ¿Seré yo, encadenada ante sus hermanos, o será usted, delante de una esclusa y rodeado por mis muchachos?».

languages.text: {n}彼女は不吉そうに笑った。{/n}「技術司祭さん、あたしを脅すつもりかい？じゃあ、この会話も記録しておいてくれよ。どっちが先に裁きを受けるかな？あんたの同胞の前に鎖につながれたあたしか、それとも部下たちの前でにエアロックに閉じ込められたあんたになるのか、見ものじゃないか」
languages.original_text: {n}She chuckles darkly.{/n} "Do you mean to threaten me, Tech-Priest? Well, then, I'll keep a record of this conversation, too. I wonder which of us will feel the harsh hand of justice first? Will it be me, standing in chains before your brethren, or you, standing in an airlock before my boys?"

traits.locale_text: {n}彼女は不吉そうに笑った。{/n}「技術司祭さん、あたしを脅すつもりかい？じゃあ、この会話も記録しておいてくれよ。どっちが先に裁きを受けるかな？あんたの同胞の前に鎖につながれたあたしか、それとも部下たちの前でにエアロックに閉じ込められたあんたになるのか、見ものじゃないか」

languages.text: {n}Sie kichert finster.{/n} "Wollt Ihr mich etwa bedrohen, Techpriester? Nun, dann werde auch ich eine Aufzeichnung dieses Gesprächs aufbewahren. Ich bin gespannt, wer von uns die strenge Hand des Gesetzes zuerst spürt. Werde ich in Ketten vor Euren Brüdern stehen oder Ihr in einer Luftschleuse vor meinen Jungs?"
languages.original_text: {n}She chuckles darkly.{/n} "Do you mean to threaten me, Tech-Priest? Well, then, I'll keep a record of this conversation, too. I wonder which of us will feel the harsh hand of justice first? Will it be me, standing in chains before your brethren, or you, standing in an airlock before my boys?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Sie kichert finster.{/n} "Wollt Ihr mich etwa bedrohen, Techpriester? Nun, dann werde auch ich eine Aufzeichnung dieses Gesprächs aufbewahren. Ich bin gespannt, wer von uns die strenge Hand des Gesetzes zuerst spürt. Werde ich in Ketten vor Euren Brüdern stehen oder Ihr in einer Luftschleuse vor meinen Jungs?"

languages.text: {n}Elle rit de façon inquiétante.{/n} « Vous voulez me menacer, technoprêtre ? Dans ce cas, moi aussi, je vais garder un enregistrement de cette conversation. Je me demande bien lequel de nous deux tombera le premier sous le coup de la justice... Est-ce moi qui vais me retrouver enchaînée devant vos frères, ou vous, dans un sas devant mes gars ? »
languages.original_text: {n}She chuckles darkly.{/n} "Do you mean to threaten me, Tech-Priest? Well, then, I'll keep a record of this conversation, too. I wonder which of us will feel the harsh hand of justice first? Will it be me, standing in chains before your brethren, or you, standing in an airlock before my boys?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Elle rit de façon inquiétante.{/n} « Vous voulez me menacer, technoprêtre ? Dans ce cas, moi aussi, je vais garder un enregistrement de cette conversation. Je me demande bien lequel de nous deux tombera le premier sous le coup de la justice... Est-ce moi qui vais me retrouver enchaînée devant vos frères, ou vous, dans un sas devant mes gars ? »

languages.text: {n}Ryzza, tehditkârca gülüyor.{/n} "Beni tehdit mi ediyorsun Tekno Rahip? Peki o hâlde, ben de bu konuşmanın kaydını tutuyorum. Acaba önce hangimiz adaletin haşin elini yakasında bulacak? Kardeşlerinin karşısında bana zincir mi vurulacak, yoksa oğlanlarım seni hava kilidinin önüne mi atacak?"
languages.original_text: {n}She chuckles darkly.{/n} "Do you mean to threaten me, Tech-Priest? Well, then, I'll keep a record of this conversation, too. I wonder which of us will feel the harsh hand of justice first? Will it be me, standing in chains before your brethren, or you, standing in an airlock before my boys?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ryzza, tehditkâr bir şekilde gülüyor.{/n} "Acaba beni tehdit etmeye mi çalıştın Tekno Rahip? Pekâlâ o hâlde, ben de bu konuşmanın kaydını tutuyorum. Acaba önce hangimiz adaletin haşin elini yakasında bulacak? Kardeşlerinin karşısında bana zincir mi vurulacak, yoksa oğlanlarım seni hava kilidinin önüne mi atacak?"
